column4: yeah, most lexmark printers are paper-weights when it comes to linux
every once and a while someone will try to paste their entire xorg.conf or something
ok, my darn nautilus is broken
b/c nautilus is junk, like most linux software
I don't think it's nautilus that's causing the problem for me right now, though.... I'm pretty sure it's GnomeVFS
I have HH on a testing partition though
ah.... I'm having some nautilus issues due to the GnomeVFS changes they are making
on HH?  HH uses GVFS, not GnomeVFS
no, GVFS is the replacement for GnomeVFS
right... well, you know what I meant. :-p
